record_payment: Receive payments in cash/check and record payments manually.
email_invoice: You can now email this invoice to your customer or mark it as sent.
invoice_preview_unavailable: Invoice Preview is not available right now! Please try again...
upload_excel_csv: Upload an EXCEL or CSV file
buyer_copy: This is the first copy of the invoice for the buyer.
transporter_copy: This is to be carried with the transporter.
supplier_copy: This one is for the suppliers’ own record.
delete_voucher: Do you want to delete the voucher(s)?
delete_record: Do you want to delete the selected records?
delete_voucher_invoice: Do you want to delete the voucher/invoice?
choose_field_bulk_update: Choose a field from the dropdown and update with new information.
bulk_invoice_update_note: Note: All the selected invoices will be updated with new information and you cannot undo this.
bulk_image_note: The image / slogan will show only if the 'image / slogan' option is enabled from the invoice templates.

e_invoice_statuses.yet_to_be_pushed: The transaction is yet to be pushed to the IRP for e-Invoicing.
e_invoice_statuses.pushed: The transaction was pushed to the IRP successfully, and a QR code and IRN has been generated for it.
e_invoice_statuses.push_initiated: The transaction is being pushed to the IRP as part of a bulk push action.
e_invoice_statuses.cancelled: The e-Invoiced transaction has been cancelled in both Giddh and the IRP. The IRN associated with it is no longer valid.
e_invoice_statuses.mark_as_cancelled: The e-Invoiced transaction has been marked as cancelled in Giddh Books alone. You’ll have to cancel it in the GST portal to make the IRN invalid.
e_invoice_statuses.failed: The transaction could not be pushed to the IRP.
e_invoice_statuses.na: e-Invoice creation is not applicable for this transaction.
e_invoice_statuses.giddh_invoice_not_cancelled: The e-Invoiced transaction has been cancelled in the IRP but not in Giddh. The IRN associated with it is no longer valid.

no_advance_receipt: There is no advanced receipt for adjustment.
pincode_required: Please update pincode in voucher before creating eway bill.
thermal_message: Preview is not available if Thermal Template is selected. Please change it in the template setting for default template to preview the invoice.
